## Graph it 

```{r, fig.height=5, fig.width=10}

df_sp %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Wavelenght,y=Absorbance))+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Cultivar))+
  theme_bw()+
scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(min(df_sp$Wavelenght),max(df_sp$Wavelenght),100))+
  #labs(x=" Wavelenght", y=" Absorbance")+
  #scale_color_manual(values=c("#333333", "#9999CC", "#CC3300"))+
  #facet_wrap(~IncubationDays,scale="free")+
  #facet_wrap(~Cultivar,scale="free")+
  facet_grid(IncubationDays ~.) +
  theme_bw()+
scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(min(df_sp$Wavelenght),max(df_sp$Wavelenght),400))+
  scale_x_reverse()+
 # scale_x_reverse(lim=c(650,4000))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) +
  expand_limits(y=c(0,0.2)) +
  geom_abline(intercept = 0.1, slope = 0)
  #geom_vline(intercept = 1000, slope = 0)
    #scale_x_date(labels = date_format("%b-%Y"))


```
